title: Kubernetes Distributions
description: There are many Kubernetes distributions to choose from.

items.title: Kubernetes
items.description: Kubernetes, also known as K8s, is an open-source system for automating deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications.

items.title: K3S
items.description: The lightweight, highly available, certified Kubernetes distribution built for IoT & Edge computing.

items.title: microk8s
items.description: MicroK8s is the simplest production-grade conformant K8s. Lightweight and focused. Single command install on Linux, Windows and macOS.
